body.Title: Web Developer
body.Description:
Full stack web development mainly specialising in front-end, but also extending to back-end and dev-ops roles where required. I worked as the companies' only front-end dev, building websites in Magento, Wordpress, Umbraco and occasionally a little Drupal.

I also worked on back-end logic extensively in Wordpress and Magento and also assisted in the administration of Linux servers (mainly Debian, but a few Centos), Windows servers and the setup and maintenance of company machines.

body.Title: Store Assistant
body.Description: Serving customers and setting up demos. Helping to maintain the company website, uploading products and modifying prices etc. Packaging orders for dispatch and other admin tasks.

body.Title: Web Developer (Work Experience)
body.Description: Basic PHP development in Wordpress and Magento. Including developing logic for contact forms, theme creation and debugging.

body.Title: KnowHow Colleague (Temporary)
body.Description: Customer service role. Diagnosing computer faults and performing basic software setups & repairs. Resolving any customer issues such as failed deliveries or misrepresented sales. Processing returns and exchanges.

body.Title: Secretary
body.Description:
Voluntary role. Administering the societies affairs, including; Organising and publicising details of society meetings, minutes, processing requests for membership, and submitting the annual return to the FCA.

Included greatly simplifying the societies' rules.

body.Title: Webmaster
body.Description: Voluntary role. Building and maintaining the societiesâ€™ wordpress website. Uploading details of upcoming fairs and writing summaries of past events.
